name: 陳柔妃
objective:
本課程主要授與學生程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以Scratch 3.0語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入C或 JAVA程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計之基礎。
This course introduces to the students the basic computer programming concepts. Syntax and semantics of the Scratch 3.0 programming languages will be introduced. Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computer solutions, effective methods of program design using structured programming notions of sequence, selection, and iteration structures.
